text: You can walk between any of the science buildings on north campus without going outside

text: Head to the Lakefill during winter to see cool ice formations

text: 2nd floor F-wing in tech is a beautiful place to work

text: In fall, you can see salmon hanging out in the outlet stream for the Lakefill lagoon.

text: You can also see carp at the lakefill lagoon in spring.
